extendedInfo.description: Download the "GPS Tracker" and transform your Android into a premium GPS tracking device.The "GPS Phone Tracker" combines the robust GPS functionality of the Android with the most popular internet mapping tool to create a secure, permission-based system that allows people to see each other's current location as well follow their movements for the past 48 hours.ââââââââââââââââââFollow both Androids and iPhones!ââââââââââââââââââFeatures Include:âº Follow multiple people on a single mapâº See people's movements for the past 48 hoursâº Locate anyone with an accuracy of 30 feetâº Log locations from every 2 minutes to 60 minutesâº Attach photos to identify users on mapsâº Select time frame to see other's movementsâº Use satellite maps or street mapsâº Follow both iPhones and Android phonesââââââââââââââââââThe "GPS Phone Tracker" is the perfect way to stay connected with friends, family and coworkers.  Now you can see where your contacts are in near-real time with your Android phone.ââââââââââââââââââUses include:âº Follow kids movements during the dayâº Know where family is at any timeâº Track employees  during work hoursâº Locate friendsâº Find lost or stolen phonesOther items:âº This version allows you to track 2 other Androids.  Upgrade to follow up to 10 people.âº To follow another person, they must use the "GPS Tracker" to grant you permission.âº IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, PLEASE EMAIL US AT: HELP@PhoneTracker.us.com

reviews.comment: A rip off. Paid for it, then paid additional 99cents to travk more than one. Can only track myself. Does not accept others\' veification codes. Friend with iPhone says he can track me OK.
reviews.author: Roger Nichols

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: Overall this app is cumbersome and lags. It stops updating randomly and complains of no connectivity, even though I was connected to Wi-Fi and even switched to 4G. Quickly I began to not trust what the app was telling me, although sometimes it was right. I actually think the \"Lite\" version worked better than the paid version. I was doing ok with the Lite version and upgraded. Wish I hadn\'t.
reviews.author: Casey Mills

reviews.title: Crap!!!
reviews.comment: The title says it all. Do not waste your money. Half the time it freezes your phone, the other time it will not pick up the phone you\'re tracking and you know the GPS is on. Don\'t bother writing to the app designer. You get no reply. If you want a refund, you only have 15 minutes to get it. Pretty slick scam cause it takes that long to install and try it out just to did out it\'s CRAP!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: erm
reviews.comment: well it seems to track me fine but i already know where i am! won\'t track anyone else. please fix or i will be wanting a refund!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: James N...
reviews.comment: This is the BEST tracking app I\'ve ever used!! It\'s well worth more than $2.99!! It helps build trust back when you\'re involved in a relationship where there might be suspicions of your whereabouts...lol. I believe this app to be a helpful tool when trying to fix minor trust issues within your relationship. I give Cell Phone Solutions a HUGE thank you for this one!! Keep \'em coming...lol.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ok when it works. constant crashes
reviews.comment: Keeps asking me if i want to know about the paid version. Freezes. Erratic performance. I want to be able to mark certain spots/waymarks for reference. Don\'t really think it\'s worth paying for.  I have changed my rating to one star because it keeps freezing up, and acting poorly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works nice
reviews.comment: Once I finally got registration code, the app works great to keep track of my teens.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: crappy
reviews.comment: would be better if theapp didn\'t freeze so much. change that and I will be happy. works great otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: Well, it occasionally does what is promised but it also freezes my phone and drains the battery in a few hours.
reviews.author: Esko Matikainen

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Keeps getting stuck trying to update location. Bought the app but keeps trying to sell me an \"upgrade\" every time I open the app. The one time it worked, it was wrong. Do not buy.
reviews.author: Janet C

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Basically an amazing and VERY useful app.  Glad I bought it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: I upgraded to the premium package or whatever, paid for it and it won\'t let me use it.
reviews.author: ben deal

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Not a bad little app.

reviews.comment: Its been a pain

reviews.title: Skip this app
reviews.comment: Keeps forcing closed.  X2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Brand new app that is accurate and lets you see where people who allow you to follow their location are. Dev is responsive, too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phone Tracker
reviews.comment: Could not get it to work, could not find instructions.  Can\'t recommend
reviews.author: Phillip Hoy

reviews.title: DOESN\'T WORK! DON\'T INSTALL!
reviews.comment: when you try to install this, it asks for email & password. When you enter these details, app won\'t go any further. My friend had same problem with same app on IPhone. It says you can email their helpdesk if you have problems (should\'ve guessed then it was a dud) but they don\'t respond. DON\'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS!
reviews.author: Melanie Luscombe
